title: 2014 Campeonato Carioca
text:
The 2014 <a href="Campeonato%20Carioca">Campeonato Carioca de Futebol</a> (officially the 2014 Cariocão Guaraviton for sponsorship reasons) was the 113th edition of the top tier <a href="Association%20football">football</a> of <a href="Federa%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20de%20Futebol%20do%20Estado%20do%20Rio%20de%20Janeiro">FFERJ</a> (Federação de Futebol do Estado do Rio de Janeiro, or Rio de Janeiro State Football Federation). The top four teams advanced to the <a href="2015%20Copa%20do%20Brasil">2015 Copa do Brasil</a>.
This edition was contested as a single round-robin, <a href="Ta%C3%A7a%20Guanabara">Guanabara Cup</a>, followed by a semifinal and final. After each of the 16 teams had played each other once, the four best placed teams advanced to the semifinals.
First phase (Taça Guanabara).
<onlyinclude></onlyinclude>
